name: az204-quiz-app
description: Full-stack AZ-204 certification practice quiz application

scripts.install-all: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend
scripts.test-all: npm run test-backend && npm run test-frontend
scripts.test-coverage: npm run test-backend -- --coverage && npm run test-frontend -- --coverage
scripts.deploy: npm run install-backend && npm run install-frontend && npm run build-frontend
